name: Universal Database Client (UDBC)
short_description: A generic mysql-like client for multiple databases: Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, DB2, Sybase, MySQL, InterBase, Ingres, Informix, mSQL, SQLLite, Access, ODBC, JDBC, CSV, Excel, etc. Can show retrieved data as: csv, html, table, tab, vertically and xml
